title: S2 Ep5: The end of globalisation?
itunes:title: The end of globalisation?
description: Trade growth is slowing down. But is it, as the media and populist politicians claim, the end of globalisation? Kevin O'Rourke tells Tim Phillips how economic history can answer the question, and what we can learn from the history of global trade.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
